name: Meowoomba
description:
My submission for the Bit Byte Jam. Since we have a limited color palette I went with a retro Gameboy aesthetic. I really wanted to try making a mobile game for this one so it's playable on either PC or mobile. However, the screen resolution will probably be wrong due to bad planning.

Controls for Keyboard:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

E to throw

You play as a cute mouse girl who lives on a space station that has been overrun by slimes. But unfortunately, your meowoomba doesn't want to clean up their mess. So you're going to drag around your little robotic minion and chuck it at the slime. You'll make it do its job one way or another.

music by abstraction: http://www.abstractionmusic.com/
